title: Unnecessary references to old packages in .NET 6 NuGet
body:
After resolving CG alerts with https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/7538, our NuGet packages have some new references to old packages (`System.Private.Uri` and `System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates`), which aren't necessary.

See https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/commit/20cdf6ff1f617fc6d486c170dff95df0300676e3#r73617987.
